text: Motion
Motion
A talk show about picture books...?
Ahh.

A famous picture book author is releasing a new book,
and they're doing an online event to coincide with it.

Chiyuki might know,
it's the author famous for ghost picture books──
Yes, I know of them.

I've loved them since I was a child,
and I brought them with me when I moved here.

I see.
They're your favorite, huh?

Yes.
...Very much!

Well then,
could you consider it positively?

The publisher is really eager to have you as a panelist,
Chiyuki...

I'm so happy to hear that.
I'd love to meet the author of my favorite picture books...
But, am I really the right person for this?

Isn't there someone who knows more
and can have a deeper discussion...?

It seems there will be a picture book critic
on the panel who is very knowledgeable.
So, it's fine for Chiyuki to just be herself.
Be myself...?
Yes.

How about going with the intention of
conveying your "love" for their work?
Hehe...

So that's how Producer-san
thinks I can be myself.
Did I miss the mark?
No, not at all──

...Because I was just about to ask
if I could please do it.
I see, that's great!
I'll let them know then.
Yes, but...

I still want to study up beforehand,
so may I go to the bookstore later?

Of course.
I'll carry your bags.

I'm going to be on stage with my favorite author,
so I want to be fully prepared.
Yes!

Otherwise, I won't be able to properly
convey my "love" for their work.
I also want to look over the critic's books.

That way, I can better understand what kind
of discussions they might lead, and imagine the flow.

I see.
I'll make a list of the critic's works for you later.

Thank you so much...!
That would be very helpful.
This is a rare opportunity...

I want to approach the job
feeling like I've done everything I can.

Of course,
I don't intend to neglect my other work either...
Please take care of me, Producer-san!
